Class CreateTextField

java.lang.Object
com.coldline.src.uihandler.BaseRequirements
com.coldline.src.uihandler.CreateTextField
All Implemented Interfaces:
FrameGetter, SetComponentFont, TextFieldGetter
public class CreateTextField extends BaseRequirements implements TextFieldGetter, SetComponentFont
creates text field to receive inputs from buttons
